#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define in(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
int main() 
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--) 
   {
   	  long long int n,sum=1;
      in(n);
      for ( int j = 2; j * j <= n; j++ ) 
	  {
         if ( n % j == 0 ) 
         {
         sum += j;
         if(j*j!=n)
         sum += n / j;	
         }
      }
     printf("%lld\n",sum);
   }
}
